    • findUser

      Retrieves the user with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to retrieve
      Returns:
      the UserDTO object representing the found user

    • insertUser

      Inserts a new user.
      Parameters:
      userDTO - the UserDTO object containing the information about the user to insert
      Returns:
      the ID of the inserted user

    • insertClient

      @PostMapping("/insertClient") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView insertClient(@Valid @Valid UserDTO userDTO)
      Inserts a new client. This method inserts a new client into the system using the provided UserDTO object.
      Parameters:
      userDTO - the UserDTO object containing the information about the client to insert
      Returns:
      a ModelAndView object to redirect to the home page after the insertion

      Updates a user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to update
      userDTO - the UserDTO object containing the new information for the user to update

      the UserDTO object representing the updated user
